title: Bug 13196 - Consequences of changes in browsing
description: There are consequences of changes in browsing that need to be addressed.
OB: When there are changes in browsing, the behavior of the manipulations should be consistent.
EB: Currently, when there are changes in browsing, the behavior of the manipulations is inconsistent. If there is an open editor, all manipulations should work on the working copy shown in the editor.
SR: To fix this issue, ensure that when there are changes in browsing, all manipulations consistently work on the working copy shown in the editor.
